title: Does the Samsung Galaxy M31 support 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Samsung Galaxy M31 in India today launch: Expected value, highlights and specifcations  Features Samsung Galaxy M31 is set to be launched in India todayThe telephone has been prodded to get a quad-camera set-up with a 64MP cameraThe Galaxy M31 could be fueled by an Exynos 9611 chipsetSouth Korean tech goliath, Samsung, is set to launch the Galaxy M31 in India later today. The cell phone had before been uncovered to launch on February 25, with the organization likewise uncovering key insights concerning it through various secrets. See more details on Official site

No it doesn’t support 5g. However the key features of the M31 is it’s 64mp quad camera, 6000 mah battery, sAmoled display. If you’re looking for a galaxy phone that supports 5g you can consider A90 5g which is currently priced at 53,390 which I think is a waste of money as in India 4g is working like 3g.
